innhold.avsnitt: If you or the other parent gets sick and cannot take care of the child, you can choose between:

liste.punkt: The other parent taking over the parental benefit period of the person who is sick.
The person who is sick postponing his/her parental benefit period.

innhold.avsnitt: You can postpone or transfer the parental benefit due to sickness at any time after the child is born. If the nature of the sickness makes the parent complete dependent on assistance in taking care of the child, he or she may instead be entitled to a sickness benefit.

avsnitt.lenke: Read more about the sickness benefit
